select1.label: Depth of Footing (in M)
Width of Footing (in M)
Plinth Level Height from Ground Level (in M)
No. of storey not more than one + attic
No. of storey not more than one + attic for RCC bands or No. of storey not more than one for wooden bands
No. of storey not more than two + attic
No. of storey not more than three
No of Bay is greater than 2 and not more than 6
The total height of building is not more than 11 m
Length of house is not more than 3 times its width
Length of room is not be greater than 12 times of wall thickness and not greater than 4.5 m
Area of room is not greater than 13.5 Sq.m.
Area of building is not more than 1000 sq.ft and room inside 4 column is not more than 13.5 sq.m.
House shape is rectangular or square
Individual height of each storey is in between 2.75m and 3.35m
The foundation bed is on the same level throughout the foundation in flat area.
The depth of foundation is at least 750 mm
The depth of foundation is at least 800 mm for one storey and 900 mm for two storey
Width of foundation: for soft soil >= 800 mm, for medium soil>=750 mm and for hard soil>=750mm
Width of foundation: for soft soil >= 750 mm, for medium soil>=650 mm and for hard soil>=550mm
In case of one storey and two storey Width of foundation: for soft soil >= 800 mm, for medium soil>=600 mm and for hard soil>=600mm

In case of one storey Width of foundation: for soft soil >= 650 mm, for medium soil>=550 mm and for hard soil>=550mm or In case of two storey Width of foundation: for soft soil >= 900 mm, for medium soil>=650 mm and for hard soil>=550mm
The top level of plinth should be at least 300 mm above ground level.

At corner width of foundation is >= 2.2 m for weak soil,>=1.5 m for soft soil, >=1.25 m for medium soil, >=1.2 m for hard soil.
At front width of foundation is >= 2.4 m for weak soil,>=1.65 m for soft soil, >=1.4 m for medium soil, >=1.1 m for hard soil.

The reinforcement is started from foundation.

At corners and junctions vertical reinforcing bar provided is 12mm for one storey or 16 mm for two storey building. At jambs, the reinforcing bars also 12mm. OR For Wood 75mm * 100mm for joints, wall corners and adjacent to all doors and windows OR For Bamboo the size of vertical bamboo reinforcement be more than 80mm in diameter having thickness of at least 10mm
The reinforcement bar lapping be at least 60 times the diameter of biggest bar.
The vertical steel bar reinforcement are used in adjacent to door, windows and wall corners
Is plinth band is provided ?
Type of Plinth Band
Grade of RCC
Number of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)
Diameter of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)
Distance between Stirrups (in mm)
Diameter of Stirrups Bar Used (in mm)
Thickness of band (in mm)
Width of band (in mm)
Size of Wood Used (in mm * mm / Dia. mm)
Size of Bamboo Used (Dia. mm)
Size of Strip Used(in mm * mm and @ C/C mm)

A continuous plinth band is provided through all walls at the plinth level. The minimum thickness is 75mm for hard soil. In case of soft soil, band is 150mm thick OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 38mm with batten of 50mm * 30mm @500mm c/c.
The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness and 4-12 bars in 150mm thick plinth band is provided. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover is 25 mm.
The width of plinth band is not be less than 350 mm or width of foundation wall with least dimension of 230 mm for BMC
The Least Dimension of Opening from Inside Corner (in M)
The Least Distance between two Openings in Line Wall (in M)
The walls are interlocked and laid staggered. At corners or wall junctions, continuous vertical joints is avoided by properly laying large stones. The wall is interlocked. Also vertical as of plumb.
Average mortar joints are not more than 20 mm and less than 10 mm in thickness.
Spacing of through stone is more than 1200 mm in the horizontal direction and 600 mm in vertical direction.
The wall thickness is not less or more than 350 – 450 mm for one storey houses
The wall thickness is at least 350 mm
The wall thickness is either 230 mm or 110 mm
The wall thickness is at least 230 mm for one storey or 350mm at GF and 230mm in FF for two storey
The height of wall between floors is not more than 8 times wall thickness or is maximum room height is 3 M.
The very long wall is supported horizantly
The light materials are used in gable wall
Openings are to be located away from inside corners by ¼ of the height of the adjoining opening, but not less than 600 mm.
Total length of opening is less than 0.3 of individual wall length.
Total length of opening is 50% of length of individual wall for one storey and 42% for two storey..
Total length of opening is 30% of length of individual wall length.
Distance between the two openings is larger of half the height of shorter opening or 600 mm.
Keep lintel level same for doors and windows.
Is Sill Band provided ?
Type of Sill Band
Grade of RCC
Number of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)
Diameter of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)
Distance between Stirrups (in mm)
Diameter of Stirrups Bar Used (in mm)

Width of band (in mm)
Size of Wood/Bamboo Used (in mm * mm / Dia. mm)
Size of Bamboo Used (in mm * mm / Dia. mm)
Size of Strip Used(@ C/C mm)
A continuous sill band is provided through all walls at the bottom levels of opening. The minimum thickness is 75mm. OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 38mm with batten of 50mm * 30mm @500mm c/c.
The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness and 4-12 bars in 150mm sill plinth band is provided. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover shall be 25 mm.
The lapping of reinforcement is 60 times the biggest dia. bar.
Is Stiches is provided ?
Type of Stiches
Interval Height of Stiches (in M)
Grade of RCC

The stitches shall be provided at all corners, junctions of walls to strengthen connections with 1.2 m in length. The minimum thickness is 75mm. OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 38mm with batten of 50mm * 30mm @500mm c/c.
The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover is 25 mm.
The lapping of reinforcement is 60 times the biggest dia. bar.
Is Lintel Band is provided ?
Type of Lintel Band
Grade of RCC
Number of Reinforcement Bar Used (in mm)

Diameter of Stirrups Bar Used (in mm)
Thickness of band (in mm)
Width of band (in mm)
Size of Wood Used (in mm * mm)
Size of Strip Used(in mm * mm and @ C/C mm)

A continuous Lintel band shall be provided through all walls at the top levels of opening. The minimum thickness is 75mm. In case of opening larger than 1m, the minimum thickness is 150 mm. OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 38mm with batten of 50mm * 30mm @500mm c/c.
The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness and 4-12 bars in 150mm thick lintel band is provided. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover is 25 mm.
The lapping of reinforcement is 60 times the biggest dia. bar.
Is roof band provided?
Type of Roof Band
Grade of RCC

Size of Strip Used(in mm * mm and @ C/C mm)

Roof band is provided at the top walls, so as to tie the walls at their top and tie the roof to the walls. The minimum thickness is 75mm. OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 38mm with batten of 50mm * 30mm @500mm c/c.
The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness is provided. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover shall be 25 mm.
The lapping of reinforcement is 60 times the biggest dia. bar.

Size of Strip Used(in mm * mm and @ C/C mm)

Masonry gable wall must have the triangular portion of masonry enclosed in reinforced concrete band. The minimum height of band is 75mm. It is recommended to replace gable masonry wall with light-weight materials such as metal sheet or timber. OR For Wood strip size of 2 - 75mm * 100mm with strip 50mm * 38mm @500mm c/c.
The 2-12 reinforcement bar in 75 mm thickness is provided. Use of 6mm dia. Stirrups at 150mm centers. The concrete cover shall be 25 mm.
The lapping of reinforcement is 60 times the biggest dia. bar.

input.label: मोवाईल नं:
input.hint: नम्वर थाहा नभएमा १० वटा ९ राख्नु होला ।

select1.label: जातजाती
लिंग
भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण प्रविधि तालिम प्राप्त डकर्मी हो वा होईन ?
तालिम प्राप्त डकर्मी भए NSET वाट तालिम प्राप्त वा अन्य वाट हो ?

input.label: NSET वाट तालिम प्राप्त डकर्मी भएमा कति महिना पहिले तालिम प्राप्त गरेको हो ?
घर वनाउदा लागेको लागत वा घर वनाउनको लागी लगानी गर्न चाहेको लागत
input.hint: (सरकारवाट अनुदान प्राप्त गरेको भए सो वाहेक)

input.label: तालिम प्राप्त डकर्मीलाई घर वनाउदा दिएको दैनिक ज्याला प्रतिदिन (रु)
सामान्य डकर्मीलाई घर वनाउदा दिएको दैनिक ज्याला प्रतिदिन (रु)

select1.label: घर वनाउन प्राविधिक सल्लाह लिएको छ, छैन ।

input.label: प्राविधिक सहायता लिएको भए कसवाट लिएको हो सो खुलाउनु होला ।

select1.label: घर वनाउदा वरीपरि वा कसैले वनाएको घरवाट प्रभावित भई सो वमोजिम घर वनाउन लागेको वा वनाएको हो होईन ।

input.label: यदी हो भने के घरको कुन कुन पक्षलाई अन्य वाट ग्रहण गरेको छ ।

select1.label: वनेको घर वा घर निर्माणस्थल वरिपरी भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण भएको, नभएको थाहा छ वा छैन ।

input.label: यदी थाहा छ भने घर वा घर निर्माणस्थलवाट कति दूरीमा रहेको छ।
input.hint: (पैदल हिडेर पुगिने समय उल्लेख गर्नु होला)

select1.label: भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी कुनै कार्यक्रममा भाग लिएको छ, छैन ?
भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी कुनै कार्यक्रममा भाग लिएको छ भने कति पहिले लिएको हो ?
भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी संचार माध्यमवाट (जस्तै रेडियो, टिभी, पत्रिका) सुन्ने, हेर्ने, पदने गरेको छ, छैन ।

input.label: भूकम्प प्रतिरोधी घर निर्माण सम्वन्धी संचार माध्यमवाट (जस्तै रेडियो, टिभी, पत्रिका) सुन्ने, हेर्ने, पदने गरेको छ भने मन परेको संचार माध्यम कुन हो ? प्राथमिकरण गर्नु होला ।
input.hint: (टिभी, रेडियो, पत्रपत्रिका, पुस्तक, नमूना घर, अन्य)

select1.label: पहिलो
दोस्रो
तेस्रो
अवको पांच वर्षभित्र घरधनी वसाई सरी जाने सोचमा रहेको छ, छैन ।
घर धनीको उमेर समूह
घरमा वसोवासको अवस्था
घर धनीको पेशा
घर धनीको साक्षरता
घर परिवारको कुनै सदस्य वैदेशिक रोजगारमा रहेको छ, छैन ?

input.label: घर परिवारको कुनै सदस्य वैदेशिक रोजगारमा रहेको भए, कति वर्ष पहिले देखि रहेको छ ।

select1.label: घरधनीको मासिक पारिवारीक आम्दानी
घरधनीलाई आवश्यक भएको खण्डमा पुन सम्पर्क गर्न सकिन्छ सकिदैन
